item.description:
Sometimes They Come Back

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Key Art

1991 • 1 hr 38 min • • R
Horror

Description
The Stephen King story of a man whose brother was murdered years ago and whose killers’ dead spirits have come back to life, hellbent on revenge.

Subtitles: English

Starring: Brooke Adams, Tim Matheson, Wiliam Sanderson, Chris Demetral, Robert Rusler
Directed by: Tom McLoughlin
